All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationRunner
    Class contains method to run Spring Boot application.
    ErrorCode
    Class presents custom error code which is based on entity field, which is incorrect.
    ErrorDetails
    Class presents error details, such as message key for localization, incorrect parameter, error code.
    GiftCertificate
    Class presents gift certificate entity.
    GiftCertificateAudit
    Class is listener for gift certificate entity.
    GiftCertificateController
    Class is an endpoint of the API which performs CRUD operations on gift certificates.
    GiftCertificateDao
    The interface for working with gift_certificate and gift_certificate_tag_connection tables in database.
    GiftCertificateDaoImpl
    Class is implementation of interface GiftCertificateDao for working with gift_certificate table in database.
    GiftCertificateDaoImplTest  
    GiftCertificateDto
    Class is implementation of pattern DTO for transmission gift certificate entity between service and controller.
    GiftCertificateQueryCreator
    Class designed to create query.
    GiftCertificateSearchParams
    Class presents params which are used for searching gift certificates in database.
    GiftCertificateSearchParamsDto
    Class is implementation of pattern DTO for transmission gift certificate search params between service and controller
    GiftCertificateService
    The interface for operations with gift certificates.
    GiftCertificateServiceImpl
    Class is implementation of interface GiftCertificateService for operations with gift certificates.
    GiftCertificateServiceImplTest  
    GiftCertificateValidator
    Class provides methods to validate fields of GiftCertificateDto.
    IncorrectParamValueException
    Thrown to indicate that params is incorrect.
    MessageKey
    Describes all message key for localization
    Order
    Class presents order entity.
    OrderAudit
    Class is listener for order entity.
    OrderController
    Class is an endpoint of the API which performs operations on orders.
    OrderDao
    The interface for working with order table in database.
    OrderDaoImpl
    Class is implementation of interface OrderDao for working with item_order table in database.
    OrderDto
    Class is implementation of pattern DTO for transmission order entity between service and controller.
    OrderedGiftCertificate
    Class presents ordered gift certificate entity.
    OrderedGiftCertificateDto
    Class is implementation of pattern DTO for transmission ordered gift certificate entity between service and controller.
    OrderedGiftCertificateId
    Class presents ordered gift certificate id.
    OrderService
    The interface for operations with orders.
    OrderServiceImpl
    Class is implementation of interface OrderService for operations with orders
    OrderServiceImplTest  
    OrderValidator
    Class provides methods to validate fields of OrderDto
    PageDto<T>
    Class is implementation of pattern DTO for transmission page entity between service and controller.
    Pagination
    Class presents data for pagination.
    PaginationDto
    Class is implementation of pattern DTO for transmission pagination entity between service and controller.
    ParamsToDtoConverter
    Class converts params to dto.
    PersistenceConfiguration
    Class contains spring persistence configuration.
    QueryParam
    Describes all query params.
    ResourceAlreadyExistsException
    Thrown to indicate that unique param already exists.
    ResourceNotFoundException
    Thrown to indicate that resource is not found.
    ResponseMessage
    Class presents entity which will be returned from controller in case generating some exception.
    RestExceptionHandler
    Class represents controller which handle all generated exceptions.
    ServiceConfiguration
    Class contains spring service configuration.
    SortingOrder
    Class presents sorting order.
    Tag
    Class presents tag entity.
    TagController
    Class is an endpoint of the API which performs operations on tags.
    TagDao
    The interface for working with tag table in database.
    TagDaoImpl
    Class is implementation of interface TagDao for working with tag table in database.
    TagDto
    Class is implementation of pattern DTO for transmission tag entity between service and controller.
    TagService
    The interface for operations with tags.
    TagServiceImpl
    Class is implementation of interface TagService for operations with tags.
    TagServiceImplTest  
    TagValidator
    Class provides methods to validate fields of tag.
    TestPersistenceConfiguration
    Class contains spring test persistence configuration.
    User
    Class presents user entity/
    UserController
    Class is an endpoint of the API which performs operations on users.
    UserDao
    The interface for working with user table in database.
    UserDaoImpl
    Class is implementation of interface UserDao for working with user table in database.
    UserDto
    Class is implementation of pattern DTO for transmission user entity between service and controller.
    UserService
    The interface for operations with users
    UserServiceImpl
    Class is implementation of interface UserService for operations with users.
    UserServiceImplTest  
    UserValidator
    Class provides methods to validate fields of UserDto
    ValidValue
    Describes all valid value for validation.
    WebConfiguration
    Class contains spring web configuration.
